You have the option to choose between two exam dates. You can 
participate in the second exam even if you have not failed or been sick 
on the first exam date.

If you pass the first exam, you are not eligible to take part in the 
second exam.

If you wish to participate in the first exam, you must register at the
 latest one week before the exam date. You can withdraw from the exam up
 until one day before.
